features: 【Sedentary Comfort】：This gel seat cushion made with gel, soft and durable, our pressure relief seat cushion disperse hip pressure, keep the hip curve. Relieve the pressure pain of the tailbone, provides additional comfort for any chair, seat, bench or stadium seat. Sitting for a long time will not feel stuffy, breathable, high resilience, comfortable, and not tired!

【Good air Permeability】：The gel seat cushion of honeycomb structure provide the maximum support and comfort, also has strong permeability and can be better circulate air. In addition, it is characterized by a high elastic gel material. The gel will always keep its original shape, without losing support, cracking and collapse!
【Anti-Slip】：The gel seat cushion is designed with non-slip bottom, anti move away from your seat. Size：14.5"x10.6" x1.18"

【Portable Detachable Cloth Cover】：Portable seat cushion design with handheld, detachable sleeve, machine washable, foldable, space saving, you can take it with you to stadium, office, other room, airplane, bus, train, car and so on.

【Perfect Gift】：Gel cushion is ideal for any home, office or office desk chair, and for outdoor, garden or garden chair. Provide you with the comfort you need when you need it. Gel cushion can be given to your family and friends who are often sedentary.I believe they will like this gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sedentary Comfort：This gel seat cushion made with gel, soft and durable, our pressure relief seat cushion disperse hip pressure, keep the hip curve. Relieve the pressure pain of the tailbone, provides additional comfort for any chair, seat, bench or stadium seat. Sitting for a long time will not feel stuffy, breathable, high resilience, comfortable, and not tired! Good air Permeability：The portable seat cushion adopts a double-sided structure design, the texture is safe and does not deform, and has built-in free-flowing air channels to increase airflow, prevent stuffiness, maintain comfort, and bring ultimate coolness and comfort. Highly elastic gel always maintains its original shape without losing support, cracking and collapsing.

Removable anti-slip case：The seat cushion comes with a removable cloth cover with silicone anti-slip particles on the bottom to prevent it from moving from the seat. The cloth cover is hand and machine washable for easy cleaning. Size：14.5"x10.6" x1.18"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Pros; Foldability and attached handles makes it easy to carry/travel with. It does add comfort and help relieve pressure. Bottom has a rubber coating so it doesn't slide around in the chair.Cons; Small size, so doesn't fill up the seat in chairs, meaning I have to move it around to get into the right position. Very thin, so while comfortable, doesn't really add a lot of cushioning.

reviews.reviewerName: T P in AustinT P in Austin
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique size, unique fold. One gel cushion to go please!
reviews.reviewText: This is a Vine review for a unique gel chair/seat cushion. Oddly enough this was being tested to potentially take the place of a larger gel cushion I got for a wood kitchen chair. It had very much the same traction on the bottom of the cover as this one, but after three months that traction was gone. I will have to allow that the cushion was both square and too large for the U-shaped chair seat, possible leading to excessive and unfair forces. It’s plausible. It’s also plausible that this non-slip surface won’t last. That cushion has been retired to a vehicle for long distance trips, and where slippage is not an issue. So that long story for review information done, I was happy to pick this modest size cushion based on its features.On with the review and the features:1. This cushion has one of the primary needs for a seat cushion IMHO, that is an easily removable and washable seat cushion cover. Ding!2. This cushion has a carry handle, two in fact! Ding!3. This cushion is gel, and IMHO gel seem to survive far longer than any so called “memory foam” Ding!(As if any memory foam seat cushion wants to remember its past! eww! ;)In this case, the gel initially seemed a bit thin, but a measurement shows 1 3/16 vs 1 4/16 for the old one. AND with the honey comb cell walls being much tighter at about 1/2” apart, this construction seems even better. See blue gel photo.4. Letting this gel out of the bag/cover, does it smell, Ludo? A little, but not a real stinker! ding.5. And last for a chair cushion checklist today, does it fit? You will need to measure for yourself, in this case perhaps, measure that will NOT be under the gel of this cushion!Other observations. The ability to fold this cushion means that a particular one sided ailment might prefer this cushion. Or prefer the other side to have the cushion. And unlike most, this allows for folding to double up one side or the other. (Turn the other cheek? :) Hey! It could happen! If so, you got it covered!Bonus fun. Thinking outside the chair here: How about a recumbent exercise bike? And with the middle fold, perhaps a saddle bag build use. Could this work on some cycle? Or for the passenger on a motorcycle? And what does gel do with those "vibrations" there??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and doesn't stay in place when you stand.
reviews.reviewText: I got this because the seats in my car are insanely uncomfortable. I'm a bit bigger, I'm 5'3 and 220lbs, bur this seat is so small. It doesn't fit my bottom and makes it more uncomfortable. It also sticks to the seat of my pants and I have to grab it off the ground each time I get up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for a portable seat
reviews.reviewText: The portability of this cushion is truly an added bonus. This is small enough to fit in a bag or large purse. Which makes this great to go from the car to your commuter seat on public transportation to your work seat or even a ball game. The cushion could stand to be a bit more sturdy. This product does take away some of the pressure one feels when sitting for prolonged periods. The cushion is simple and reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort Gaming Essential
reviews.reviewText: The Gel Seat Cushion is fantastic. I got to sit on it while at the computer at my dads house. He uses it mostly but when I'm on their computer chair you better believe I use this. The best thing about it is how good it feels. It's something about the gel that keeps it cool and also forms like a soft cushion on your seat. Definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not cover the whole seat
reviews.reviewText: I like it on my hard desk chair and it is better than not having anything. Still, its size does not cover the chair seat. I had thought it might latch or strap over the back of the chair to hold it in place but it does not. Glad to have it, but it is not what was expected, either, for full seat cushioning.
